\node (mu) at (-3,-0.03){\tiny$\mu-3\sigma$};
\node (mu) at (1,-0.03){\tiny$\mu+\sigma$};
\node (mu) at (2,-0.03){\tiny$\mu+2\sigma$};
\node (mu) at (3,-0.03){\tiny$\mu+3\sigma$};
